title: Meowrick's Cats don't fit in the already established cat thematic set by Meowkai.
body:
So these are Meowrick's cats:
https://imgur.com/am5UcJA

They're not as insanely adorable as Meowkai's, and the aesthetic is completely different.
http://newsoflegends-content.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/2016/03/Meowkai-Model-2-1024x640.jpg

Where Meowkai's kittens have beady eyes and a very stylized look that makes it unique, and has been reused in emotes and in Moo Cow Alistar's recall, Meowrick's cats look strange and lifelike, like they're trying to apply a real cat image over his ghouls. It makes them come across very awkwardly, and doesn't fit the overall already-established cat themed aesthetic of the game.
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/4/45/Hype_Kitty_Emote.png
https://www.mobafire.com/images/news/emotes/excited-kitten.png
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/TRzQZ_f1jyk/maxresdefault.jpg

Can you guys at Riot fix the textures on Meowrick's cats to bring them in line with Meowkai's kittens that we know and love? Making them the orange tabby color is fine, and strong enough to differentiate them from Meowkai's gray kittens, so I don't think having their faces look similar or the bells on their head would or should run into game clarity issues.

Edit: I wanted to add - Meowrick's cats kind of break the immersion in the game because their textures and appearances are trying to hard to be life like, that the absurd outfits and body shapes don't work, whereas a more cartoonized cat like Meowkai's offers more of that suspension of disbelief due to it's distance from life like appearance.

replies.body: I kinda like how they're these machismo pissed off cats lol

> [{quoted}](name=Placentas,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=E2HL5E6O,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-03-05T21:06:28.972+0000)
>
> I kinda like how they're these machismo pissed off cats lol

They can be machismo pissed off kittens with faces like the red glow emote in my main post.

Meowrick's cats need to have actual limbs rather than stubs because of their attack animations.

Meowkai's cats can get away with it because all they do is run up to a target and blow up on them.

> [{quoted}](name=Reaversal,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=E2HL5E6O,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-03-05T20:49:49.403+0000)
>
> Meowrick's cats need to have actual limbs rather than stubs because of their attack animations.
> 
> Meowkai's cats can get away with it because all they do is run up to a target and blow up on them.

They can have limbs and still aesthetically look like Meowkai's cats. Their face textures aren't even remotely similar, clearly despite the fact that Riot is intending the thematics to be similar with the cat pajamas and kitten minions.
One, Meowkai, has cute, cartoon styled kittens. Meowrick has weird lifelike looking kittens. Yet Riot has attempted to merge them both into the same thematic, and it's extremely off putting.

I agree, these particular iterations don't really seem to fit the April Fools style that they've established. From the artists stand point I feel like they probably went for the psuedo real looking cats to fit the theme for Yorick that he _doesn't_ fuck around, he's all business, but then you have to ask yourself, why choose him for an April Fools skin then? Isn't the point of April Fools to engage in extreme fuckery? Oh well. Maybe they'll end up changing it before it gets released? Unlikely, but still possible.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

As a side note, they could be going for the same kind of humor as old Lollipoppy, but uh, gonna be real, I'd take a hard pass on that as well.
{{sticker:sg-lulu}}
They kinda look like mini-Iverns to me with their long legs.
Yeah his look like real cats wearing weird outfits... hmm this is weird. They need to be plush-ified immediately!
Meowrick does seem to have a pink Meowkai cat on his back, but I would like it if the cats were more cartoony too.

> [{quoted}](name=EdgeLady,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=E2HL5E6O,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-03-05T20:45:58.975+0000)
>
> Meowrick does seem to have a pink Meowkai cat on his back, but I would like it if the cats were more cartoony too.

Yorick himself looks fine, I feel. He looks in the same vein as Meowkai with the silly pajamas. It's just his cats that break the established thematic.

They definitely have to be differently colored, at the very least, compared to meokai's saplings, otherwise if both were your opponent, you would have trouble telling them apart.

I don't mind the wildly different appearance because they're Yorick's ghouls; these undead walking things that previously didn't have a face, so them looking different than what was formerly saplings is acceptable to me, but at the bare minimum, different color scheme.

> [{quoted}](name=ChaosThief,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=E2HL5E6O,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2019-03-06T00:35:23.736+0000)
>
> They definitely have to be differently colored, at the very least, compared to meokai's saplings, otherwise if both were your opponent, you would have trouble telling them apart.
> 
> I don't mind the wildly different appearance because they're Yorick's ghouls; these undead walking things that previously didn't have a face, so them looking different than what was formerly saplings is acceptable to me, but at the bare minimum, different color scheme.

Yes, I think they should look like the Sapling kittens, in terms of face. But they wouldn't have the head stalk with the bell, and if they were done like tabby orange stripe, they would look different enough from Maokai's, that along with their gait and their build, would differentiate them plenty from Maokai's saplings.
this is true. Bewitching tristana's cats as well as the other halloween cats are still very realistic cat wise but with bubbly cute happy aesthetics.
arms too short had to make new ones

As a proud owner of meowkai you realize, his cat aren't real cat right? Its just his sapping in onses look at the stitching.  

Edit
Wait no im wrong colour me impress
I like the Yorick ones better, less weeb more meme
